d:testDescription.p: This tests that the getIntersectionList() and getEnclosureList() methods return NodeLists that are not live.

After loading the test, two rectangles will be presented. The upper rectangle indicates the result of testing whether getIntersectionList() returns a non-live NodeList, while the lower rectangle indicates so for getEnclosureList().

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: The test is passed if both rectangles are green.

g.text: Test getIntersectionList and getEnclosureList return value liveness
